content.title: TurboFix Hits 20% Funding in Just 48 Hours!
content.creator:
TurboFix
February 5, 2025
content.content:
Incredible news! The TurboFix has reached 20% of its funding goal on Kickstarter in just 48 hours! This innovative glue designed to last is making waves.
A massive THANK YOU to our amazing backers—you’re making this project a reality! Your support drives us forward, and we can’t wait to bring the TurboFix Applicator to life. Let’s keep up the momentum—share the campaign and help us reach 100%!
When we hit 50% funding, we have even bigger news and exciting surprises in store! Stay tuned and help us reach the next milestone!
